name: Plants vs Zombies (Purple)
description:
There’s zombies all over your lawn. The evil Dr.Zomboss has been conducting experiments, one of which created zombies. Many years later, you have moved into the neighborhood. Crazy Dave, a long-time zombie survivor and your new neighbor has introduced you into the art of plant-defense strategy in order to fight off the zombie army. Winner of over 30 game of the year awards, the fun never ends. Play now
